languages.text: Лорд-капитан сгладил{mf||а} назревающий конфликт между двумя командирами и попросил{mf||а} капитана Вести отчитаться о прогрессе его отряда.
The Lord Captain defused the conflict brewing between the two commanders and requested a report from Captain Vesti on his unit's progress.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан сгладил{mf||а} назревающий конфликт между двумя командирами и попросил{mf||а} капитана Вести отчитаться о прогрессе его отряда.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain defused the conflict brewing between the two commanders and requested a report from Captain Vesti on his unit's progress.
The Lord Captain defused the conflict brewing between the two commanders and requested a report from Captain Vesti on his unit's progress.

The Lord Captain defused the conflict brewing between the two commanders and requested a report from Captain Vesti on his unit's progress.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} desarticuló el conflicto entre comandantes y pidió al capitán Vesti un informe sobre el progreso de su unidad.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain defused the conflict brewing between the two commanders and requested a report from Captain Vesti on his unit's progress.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} desarticuló el conflicto entre comandantes y pidió al capitán Vesti un informe sobre el progreso de su unidad.

languages.text: 舰长大人化解了两位指挥官之间的冲突，并要求维斯提上尉报告部队的探索进度。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain defused the conflict brewing between the two commanders and requested a report from Captain Vesti on his unit's progress.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人化解了两位指挥官之间的冲突，并要求维斯提上尉报告部队的探索进度。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンはふたりの司令の間で起きた衝突を鎮め、ヴェスティ中隊長に部隊の進捗状況に関する報告を求めた。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain defused the conflict brewing between the two commanders and requested a report from Captain Vesti on his unit's progress.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンはふたりの司令の間で起きた衝突を鎮め、ヴェスティ中隊長に部隊の進捗状況に関する報告を求めた。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain entschärfte den Konflikt zwischen den beiden Commandern und verlangte von Captain Vesti einen Bericht über den Fortschritt seiner Einheit.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain defused the conflict brewing between the two commanders and requested a report from Captain Vesti on his unit's progress.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain entschärfte den Konflikt zwischen den beiden Commandern und verlangte von Captain Vesti einen Bericht über den Fortschritt seiner Einheit.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} désamorça le conflit qui couvait entre les deux commandants, puis demanda au capitaine Vesti un rapport sur la progression de son unité.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain defused the conflict brewing between the two commanders and requested a report from Captain Vesti on his unit's progress.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} désamorça le conflit qui couvait entre les deux commandants, puis demanda au capitaine Vesti un rapport sur la progression de son unité.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, iki komutan arasındaki gerginliği yatıştırdıktan sonra Yüzbaşı Vesti'ye durum raporu vermesini buyurdu.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain defused the conflict brewing between the two commanders and requested a report from Captain Vesti on his unit's progress.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, iki komutan arasındaki gerginliği yatıştırdıktan sonra Yüzbaşı Vesti'ye durum raporu vermesini buyurdu.
